DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare glucose measurement C8 MediSensors non-invasive Optical Glucose Monitor™ System blood glucose measurement Yellow Springs Instrument ( YSI ) blood glucose analyzer .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study C8 MediSensors Optical Glucose Monitor™
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , non-randomized , open label study evaluate performance C8 MediSensors non-invasive Optical Glucose Monitor™ individual diabetes mellitus . Capillary blood sample obtain throughout daily study session ; study session may last 12 hour . Blood glucose measure YSI blood glucose analyzer . Subjects may adjust food intake insulin administration device performance evaluate across broad range glucose concentration . Glucose measurement time match paired comparison . Skin effect adverse event evaluate .
DOC.criteria: 1 . 18 year age old . 2 . Understands agree comply study instruction . 3 . Read , understood , sign date Informed Consent Form . 1 . Pregnancy . 2 . Extensive skin change diseases preclude wear test device propose wear site ( ) ( e.g. , extensive psoriasis , recent burn severe sunburn , extensive eczema , extensive scarring , extensive tattoo , dermatitis herpetiformis ) . 3 . Employed company within diabetes field study sponsor . 4 . Medical history condition may , opinion investigator , compromise subject 's ability participate .
